content.new:
1. Open Building Editor

2. On the palette, click on any brush

3. The brush becomes selected but nothing else works. It's not possible to draw on the 2D View.

This happens because the draw mode is cancelled immediately after, from `EditorView::On
content.old:
1. Open Building Editor

2. On the palette, click on any brush

3. The brush becomes selected but nothing else works. It's not possible to draw on the 2D View.

This happens because the draw mode is cancelled immediately after, from `EditorView::On

issue.title: Building Editor: It's not possible to select draw modes
